Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:36:04
Folder: C11F7VU - unplanned outage oracle cloud services (siocs, rics, xoc)
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C11F7VU_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-19 13:37
Subject: Unplanned Outage: Oracle Cloud Services (SIOCS, RICS, XOC)
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

Please be advised of an unexpected outage currently affecting Oracle Cloud services, effective immediately.

Outage Window:
Date: Monday, 19th May 2025
Time: 11:30 AM â€“ 3:00 PM GST

 

Service Impact:
The outage is primarily impacting the Store Inventory Operations Cloud System (SIOCS), resulting in full service downtime during this window.

 

Known Current Impacts:

*	SIOCS Integration and Application are currently unavailable.
*	No inbound or outbound transactions are being processed to/from SIOCS.
*	Sales data is not integrating into SIOCS.
*	Stores can continue to sell via XStore, which remains operational. However:

	*	SIOCS will reflect inaccurate stock levels due to missing sales integration and posting from XStore.
	*	Stock deltas will not function.
	*	Access to and operations within SIOCS are currently unavailable.

*	RICS and XOC services are also down.

Oracle is actively working on identifying the root cause and implementing a fix. We are closely monitoring the situation and will keep you informed with updates as they become available.

Oracle is actively working on identifying the root cause and implementing a fix. We are closely monitoring the situation and will keep you informed with updates as they become available.

 

For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.
